```{r}
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
load("EdGenderWork.Rda")
EGW <- EdGenderWork %>% 
  select(24, 29, 31, 47:52, 64:118, 138:142, 148:152)
```

```{r}
EGW$sex <- factor(EGW$sex, levels = c(1,2), labels = c("male", "female")) %>%
EGW$q4 <- factor(EGW$q4, levels = c(1,2,3), labels = c("Men and women  equally", "women over men", "Men over women")) %>%
EGW %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>%
  count(q4)
```
